definition: at set dates/at regular intervals/periodic/limited to a fixed period of time/fixed term
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: She visited her ‘former family’ in Katni regularly.
sentences.chinese: 他也定期与她的‘家人’在卡尼特会面。

sentences.english: Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 总是喝当你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: For good performance of the spark plug you need to replace it regularly.
sentences.chinese: 为了好的性能，你应该定期更换火星塞。

sentences.english: Create full-text indexes on databases that are searched regularly.
sentences.chinese: 在需要定期进行搜索的数据库上创建全文索引。

sentences.english: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven. (
sentences.chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下万务都有定时。

sentences.english: It has been held irregularly since 1995.
For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven.
sentences.chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下万务皆有定时。

sentences.english: If necessary, to increase filter, regular maintenance and the provision of a bypass pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 必要时要加滤网，定期检修及设置旁通管路。

sentences.english: You have to write teaching plans for every class. School will check them.
sentences.chinese: 在上课之前你必须写出教案，学校会定期检查。

sentences.english: Consider creating scripts to automate the regular maintenance of queue managers.
sentences.chinese: 考虑创建脚本来自动化队列管理器的定期维护。

sentences.english: We will provide routine gynecological examinations for rural women.
sentences.chinese: 在农村妇女中开展妇科疾病定期检查。

sentences.english: Three of the reactors were already shut down for regular inspections at the time of the quake.
sentences.chinese: 其中三个反应堆已经在地震时的定期检查中关闭。

sentences.english: Patrol regularly for all the gas stations, ensure the safety and reliable of operation.
sentences.chinese: 定期巡检气站，保证运行的安全和可靠性。

sentences.english: Due to delayed and irregular reporting these, figures should be considered provisional.
sentences.chinese: 由于延迟和不定期报告，应将这些数字视为临时数字。

sentences.english: Want to check to bughouse regularly here.
sentences.chinese: 此间要定期到精神病院复查。

sentences.english: Maxwell Alves contributes articles to magazines and newspapers regularly.
sentences.chinese: 马兆融博士律师行定期在杂志和报刊上发表文章。

definition: to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
so that/so as to/in order to
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
